item.text: <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">Mount</st> of <st data-num="1636" class="">Olives</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3722">Early in the morning</st> he <st data-num="3854">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="2411">temple courts</st> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>. <st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he <st data-num="2523">sat down</st> and began to <st data-num="1321" class="">teach</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.

The <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="71" class="">brought</st> a <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> who had been <st data-num="2638" class="">caught</st> <st data-num="1909">committing</st> <st data-num="3430" class="">adultery</st>. They made <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="1722 3319">in front of</st> them

and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1320">Teacher</st>, <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st> was <st data-num="2638" class="">caught</st> <st data-num="1888">in the very act</st> of <st data-num="3431" class="">adultery</st>.
In the law Moses commanded us to stone to death such women. What then do you say?”

(<st data-num="1161">Now</st> they were <st data-num="3004" class="">asking</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> in an attempt to <st data-num="3985" class="">trap</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2443">so that</st> they could <st data-num="2192" class="">bring</st> <st data-num="2723" class="">charges</st> against<n id="1" /> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.)<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2955" class="">bent down</st> and <st data-num="1125" class="">wrote</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">ground</st> with his <st data-num="1147" class="">finger</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="5613" class="">When</st> they <st data-num="1961" class="">persisted</st> in <st data-num="2065" class="">asking</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, he <st data-num="352">stood up straight</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “Whoever among <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> is <st data-num="361" class="">guiltless</st><n id="3" /> may be the <st data-num="4413" class="">first</st> to <st data-num="906" class="">throw</st> a <st data-num="3037" class="">stone</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>.”
Then he bent over again and wrote on the ground.
Now when they heard this, they began to drift away one at a time, starting with the older ones, until Jesus was left alone with the woman standing before him.

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="352">stood up straight</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, “<st data-num="1135">Woman</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4226" class="">where</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> they? Did <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="2632" class="">condemn</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?”
She replied, “No one, Lord.” And Jesus said, “I do not condemn you either. Go, and from now on do not sin any more.”]]
Then Jesus spoke out again, “I am the light of the world! The one who follows me will never walk in darkness but will have the light of life.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="5330" class="">Pharisees</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3004">objected</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4572" class="">yourself;</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="227" class="">true</st>!”<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="2579" class="">Even if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3140" class="">testify</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">myself</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="227" class="">true</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4226" class="">where</st> I am <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> people<n id="2" /> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">where</st> I <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4159" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4226" class="">where</st> I am <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">by</st> <st data-num="4561">outward appearances</st>;<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">anyone</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st>, <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2920" class="">evaluation</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="228" class="">accurate</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">alone</st> when I judge,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st> who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> do so together.<n id="3" />
It is written in your law that the testimony of two men is true.
I testify about myself and the Father who sent me testifies about me.”
Then they began asking him, “Who is your father?” Jesus answered, “You do not know either me or my Father. If you knew me you would know my Father too.”
(Jesus spoke these words near the offering box while he was teaching in the temple courts. No one seized him because his time had not yet come.)
Then Jesus said to them again, “I am going away, and you will look for me but will die in your sin. Where I am going you cannot come.”

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> the <st data-num="2453">Jewish leaders</st><n id="1" /> began to <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="3385">Perhaps</st> he is <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st> to <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">says</st>, ‘<st data-num="3699">Where</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="5217" class="">going</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="2064" class="">come.’</st>”

Jesus <st data-num="3004" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> people<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2736" class="">below;</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="507" class="">above</st>. <st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> people <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world;</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.
Thus I told you that you will die in your sins. For unless you believe that I am he, you will die in your sins.”
So they said to him, “Who are you?” Jesus replied, “What I have told you from the beginning.

I <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4183">many things</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">say</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> the Father<n id="2" /> who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="227" class="">truthful</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2504">and</st> the <st data-num="3739">things</st> <st data-num="2504">I</st> have <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> I <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="1519">to</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.”<n id="4" />
(They did not understand that he was telling them about his Father.)
Then Jesus said, “When you lift up the Son of Man, then you will know that I am he, and I do nothing on my own initiative, but I speak just what the Father taught me.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the one who <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>. He has <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="863" class="">left</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">alone</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> those things that <st data-num="701" class="">please</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”
While he was saying these things, many people believed in him.
Then Jesus said to those Judeans who had believed him, “If you continue to follow my teaching, you are really my disciples

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you will <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> will <st data-num="1659" class="">set</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1659" class="">free</st>.”<n id="1" />

“We <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4690" class="">descendants</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st>,” they <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="2" /> “and have <st data-num="4455" class="">never</st> <st data-num="1398" class="">been</st> <st data-num="3762">anyone’s</st> <st data-num="1398" class="">slaves</st>! <st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> can <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>,<n id="3" /> ‘You will <st data-num="1096" class="">become</st> <st data-num="1658" class="">free’</st>?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3956" class="">everyone</st> who <st data-num="4160" class="">practices</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st><n id="3" /> of <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>.

The <st data-num="1401" class="">slave</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">remain</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3614" class="">family</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519 165">forever</st>, but the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">remains</st> <st data-num="1519 165">forever</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="3767" class="">So</st> <st data-num="1437" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="5207" class="">son</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1659" class="">sets</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1659">free</st>, you will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3689" class="">really</st> <st data-num="1658" class="">free</st>.

I <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="11">Abraham’s</st> <st data-num="4690" class="">descendants</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> you <st data-num="2212" class="">want</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">teaching</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="5562" class="">makes</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5562" class="">progress</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="4" />
I am telling you the things I have seen while with the Father; as for you, practice the things you have heard from the Father!”
They answered him, “Abraham is our father!” Jesus replied, “If you are Abraham’s children, you would be doing the deeds of Abraham.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> you are <st data-num="2212" class="">trying</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="615" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> has <st data-num="2980" class="">told</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> I <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3844" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>. <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>!<n id="3" />

You people are doing the deeds of your father.”

Then they said to Jesus, “We were not born as a result of immorality! We have only one Father, God himself.”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1487">If</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1510">were</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, you <st data-num="302" class="">would</st> <st data-num="25" class="">love</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have <st data-num="1831" class="">come</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2240" class="">am now here</st>.<n id="2" /> I<n id="3" /> have <st data-num="3761" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2064">come</st> <st data-num="575">on</st> <st data-num="1683">my own</st> initiative,<n id="4" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1565">he</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="649" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1223 5101">Why</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">don’t</st> you <st data-num="1097" class="">understand</st> what <st data-num="1699" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="2981" class="">saying</st>? It is <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> you <st data-num="3756 1410">cannot</st> <st data-num="191" class="">accept</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1699" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">teaching</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> people<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st><n id="2" /> your <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="2309" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> what <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="1939" class="">desires</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="1565" class="">He</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> a <st data-num="443" class="">murderer</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="746" class="">beginning</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> does <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4739">uphold</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> there <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="3752" class="">Whenever</st> he <st data-num="2980 5579">lies</st>,<n id="6" /> he <st data-num="2980" class="">speaks</st> <st data-num="1537">according to</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> nature<n id="7" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> he <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="5583" class="">liar</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">lies</st>.<n id="8" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> you<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> can <st data-num="1651" class="">prove</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1651" class="">guilty</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="4012" class="">any</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>?<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1487" class="">If</st> I am <st data-num="3004" class="">telling</st> you<n id="3" /> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>, <st data-num="1223 5101">why</st> <st data-num="3756">don’t</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>?
The one who belongs to God listens and responds to God’s words. You don’t listen and respond because you don’t belong to God.”
The Judeans replied, “Aren’t we correct in saying that you are a Samaritan and are possessed by a demon?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">answered</st>, “<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">am</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">possessed by</st> a <st data-num="1140" class="">demon</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> I <st data-num="5091" class="">honor</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> yet<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="818" class="">dishonor</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>.

<st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2212" class="">trying to get</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1391" class="">praise</st> for <st data-num="1473" class="">myself</st>.<n id="2" /> There <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> one who <st data-num="2212" class="">demands</st><n id="3" /> it, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> he also <st data-num="2919" class="">judges</st>.<n id="4" />
I tell you the solemn truth, if anyone obeys my teaching, he will never see death.”
Then the Judeans responded, “Now we know you’re possessed by a demon! Both Abraham and the prophets died, and yet you say, ‘If anyone obeys my teaching, he will never experience death.’

<st data-num="4771" class="">You</st> <st data-num="3361 1510">aren’t</st> <st data-num="3173">greater</st> than <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>, are you?<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> too! <st data-num="5101" class="">Who</st> do you <st data-num="4572 4160">claim</st> to be?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="611" class="">replied</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1437">If</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1392" class="">glorify</st> <st data-num="1683" class="">myself</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="1391" class="">glory</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">worthless</st>.<n id="2" /> The one who <st data-num="1392" class="">glorifies</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st>, about <st data-num="3739" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> people<n id="3" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘He <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2316">God</st>.’

<st data-num="2532" class="">Yet</st><n id="1" /> you do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1097">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. <st data-num="2579" class="">If</st> I were to <st data-num="3004">say</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> I do <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>,<n id="2" /> I would <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="5583" class="">liar</st> <st data-num="3664" class="">like</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>. <st data-num="235" class="">But</st> I do <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> I <st data-num="5083" class="">obey</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">teaching</st>.<n id="4" />
Your father Abraham was overjoyed to see my day, and he saw it and was glad.”
Then the Judeans replied, “You are not yet fifty years old! Have you seen Abraham?”

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “I <st data-num="3004" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="281">solemn</st> <st data-num="281">truth</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4250" class="">before</st> <st data-num="11" class="">Abraham</st> <st data-num="1096">came into existence</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">am</st>!”<n id="3" />
Then they picked up stones to throw at him, but Jesus was hidden from them and went out from the temple area.
